name: payapa-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder would take super-effective psychic-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Psychic-type attack to halve the damage.

flavor_text.black-white: Weakens a supereffective Psychic-type attack against the holding Pokémon.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Weakens a supereffective Psychic-type attack against the holding Pokémon.
